answers.answer: Martin~    First,the Xanzx has to be TAPERED. Is she doing that?  If not,call her back.  Do you have enough to get you through the weekend??Then,hit the phonebook and start calling doctors in your area to find one taking new patients.  Or do you have a new doctor now?   Is there a reason other than longevitythat's causing her to stop the Xanax?The important thing right now is that you don't go cold turkey. It's dangerous to your health.Good luck~

question: I am 40 something years old and have a laundry list of medical problems...I have R.S.D....Diabetes...Anxiety...Neurophy...ect...I've been in a wheelchair and crutches since 9/11/93...and have been takeing Xanax for 17 years...I had to change Doctors are she is cutting off the Xanax...I don't know what I am going to do....Does anyone know of a Doctor that would help me.
title: Can anyone help me Please..????
